file.content:
Tool calling / memory / chat agents: use Ash AI
Realtime UI: use LiveView
Goal-based planning + visuals: AshFlows
MCP-style behavior: Call MCP bridges from Elixir

You're in a great position to build flexible, inspectable, goal-directed chat agents—all with visibility and OTP-grade reliability. Let me know your stack or preference, and I can help wire it up.

input.content:
# Ash AI Project Context

## Project Overview
This is an Ash AI project focused on building flexible, inspectable, goal-directed chat agents with OTP-grade reliability.

**Key Components:**
- Tool calling / memory / chat agents: use Ash AI
- Realtime UI: use LiveView  
- Goal-based planning + visuals: AshFlows
- MCP-style behavior: Call MCP bridges from Elixir

## Project Structure
- Working directory: `/Users/j/Code/ash-ai/`
- Git repo: No (not initialized)
- Platform: macOS (Darwin 24.5.0)

## Development Commands
(To be populated as development workflow is established)

## Notes
- Project appears to be in early setup phase
- Focus on Elixir/Phoenix stack with Ash framework
- Emphasis on reliability and visibility for chat agents

## Last Updated
2025-06-04
